duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct, coordinate, and supervise an effective environmental control program to ensure compliance with all Federal and State laws and regulations.
Oversee waste disposal management, environmental project engineering, and pollution control.
Maintain close communications with plant personnel and government officials to ensure production and projects progress while addressing required environmental constraints.
Obtain necessary air and waste water permits, ensure compliance, and work with plant personnel to correct any noncompliance problems.
Coordinate management and disposal of hazardous and non-hazardous wastes in accordance with regulatory requirements.
Audit waste reduction processes and assure accurate completion of various external and internal reports.
Make recommendations to management for avoidance of future problem situations concerning air and water discharges.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors of Science Degree in Engineering (knowledge of California environmental regulations is required)
